author: jeongeun
body:
#### PR description:
Update event content definitions to explicitly have RECO to be a superset of AOD and for FEVT to be a superset of RECO. Clean up 'drop' that was not really used and Use explicit 'keep' command instead of 'drop'.
This is an extension of the previous tasks [PR#29025](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29025), [PR#29158](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29158)).
5 files changed :
+RecoEgamma_EventContent_cff.py
+RecoLocalCalo_EventContent_cff.py
+ecalLocalReco_EventContent_cff.py
+RecoMuon_EventContent_cff.py
+muIsolation_EventContent_cff.py

More details in [SlideMar18](https://indico.cern.ch/event/898958/contributions/3788807/attachments/2005379/3349362/SW_03182020_jelee.pdf)

#### PR validation:
Event Content comparison check was also done and there is no change with these updates.
Tested in CMSSW_11_1_X, the basic test all passed in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: Update eventcontent structure and remove drop
